## BuildLocalModulesHooks interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BuildLocalModulesHooks 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  ["build-local-module"(lmn, context)](./packer.buildlocalmoduleshooks._build-local-module_.md) | A <code>parallel</code> type hook. It will be invoked once a <code>local module</code> need be built.<!-- -->Note: This hook will be triggered by the change of each <code>module</code>'s own file and its <code>source</code> file. So this hook may be invoked multiple times with the same <code>lmn</code>. However, because we have a caching mechanism, this <code>module</code> will only be built once. |
